results.name: Compound filter (the length of rightmost run of 1's in base-2 & deficiency/abundance): a(n) = P(A089309(n), A286449(n)), where P(n,k) is sequence A000027 used as a pairing function.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Pairing Function
